Text: Oh hey f*ck this torrent. Hardcore Trojan coded nightmare. Thanks for playing.

AND if you do end up installing it, you actually can yank songs off your ipod, transfer the folder to an external drive, then do a system restore, and your comp will work right as the rain. It's really not worth the BS though. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS.
thanks for the warning :) did not download it

its workin fine for me.. AVG popped up when i was opening it & installing the copypod program, but i clicked 'remove threat' and now ive copied about a thousand songs already with no problems. thanks for this, i needed something like this to save all the songs on my ipod after my computer crashed
